patthana16.21:1.1: Kusalaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:2.1: Akusalaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:3.1: Abyākataṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.21:4.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.21:5.1: Kusalaṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:6.1: Akusalaṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.21:7.1: Abyākataṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.21:8.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
